content.detail:
For about four years, I web developed for the frontend of different Wordpress sites under The Walt Disney Company -- covering the news and editorial articles across StarWars.com, Disney Family, Disney Style, and Oh My Disney.

Projects included

  • Migrating the baby names section from Babble.com to Disney Family
  • Updating the image overlay price feature on article images that include merchandise
  • Mass updating hundreds of articles' images to include alt text for improved accessibility

images.alt: Disney Style article content, including price ratings for specific products mentioned in the article
Webpage of Star Wars content, specifically news and editorial articles
Webpage of Disney Family content, specifically craft, recipe, and other similar articles
Webpage of Oh My Disney content, specifically news and editorial articles
